pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, October 30, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, October 30, 2016:

Brussels, United Kingdom of Belgium

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium.

Melsbroek Military Airbase
Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

11:55 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at the Council of the European Union and will be greeted by His Excellency Donald Tusk, President of the European Council and His Excellency Jean-Claude Juncker, President of the European Commission.

Council of the European Union
Justus Lipsius Building
175 Rue de la Loi
Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Excellency Donald Tusk, President of the European Council and His Excellency Jean-Claude Juncker, President of the European Commission.

Council of the European Union
Justus Lipsius Building
175 Rue de la Loi
Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

12:25 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Canada-EU Plenary meeting.

Council of the European Union
Justus Lipsius Building
175 Rue de la Loi
Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an expanded Canada-EU Plenary meeting.

Council of the European Union
Justus Lipsius Building
175 Rue de la Loi
Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Signing Ceremony for the Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement and a Strategic Partnership Agreement.

Council of the European Union
Justus Lipsius Building
175 Rue de la Loi
Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with His Excellency Donald Tusk, President of the European Council and His Excellency Jean-Claude Juncker, President of the European Commission

Council of the European Union
Justus Lipsius Building
175 Rue de la Loi
Brussels, Kingdom of Belgium

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the European Parliament, Martin Schulz.

European Parliament
Station Europe
Place du Luxembourg 100
B-1047 Brussels
Belgium, Kingdom of Belgium

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa, Canada.

Please note: all times are local

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
